creator: bobharner@gmail.com
text:
The login page for Lenya 1.2.4 (and I think 1.4 as well) uses a GET
instead of a POST, which causes user passwords to be exposed in clear text in
the web access log files.

The solution is to change login.xsl from this:

        <form method="get">
          <input type="hidden" name="lenya.usecase" value="login" />
          <input type="hidden" name="lenya.step" value="login" />

to this:

        <form method="post" action="?lenya.usecase=login&lenya.step=login">

I'll attach a patch shortly...

Created attachment 17502
Patch against Lenya 1.2.x to fix bug 38383

This patch is tested against Lenya 1.2.4 1.2.x.

It might work against 1.4 as well (but not tested)
